business.headline: EPF withdrawal via UPI and ATMs coming soon. All you need to knowThis new facility will allow EPF members to withdraw their savings instantly using UPI platforms like GPay, PhonePe, and Paytm.

Sensex ends 740 points higher, Nifty snaps 10-day losing streakThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 740.30 points higher to 73,730.23 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 254.65 points lower at 22,337.30.

Looking for better returns than fixed deposits? Check these 3 investment optionsWith the RBI announcing a repo rate cut, banks have lowered fixed deposit rates, prompting investors to look for better alternatives.

Sensex surges 900 points: Is Dalal Street's losing streak finally over?Today's relief rally in domestic equities is offering some much-needed respite to traders. But with trade tensions heating up, the volatility isn't going away anytime soon. Is this the beginning of a rebound or just a temporary surge?

M&M shares rise over 4% after UBS upgrade. 3 things investors should know M&M stock price: The brokerage said the recent 19% correction in M&M's share price, compared to Nifty Auto's 13% decline, was an overreaction to EV-related concerns.

Services sector growth accelerates in February backed by strong demandHSBC's final India services Purchasing Managers' Index, compiled by S&P Global, rose to 59.0 in February from January's 26-month low of 56.5 but was lower than a preliminary estimate of 61.1.

What are reciprocal tariffs that Donald Trump mentioned in Congress address?US President Donald Trump announced the implementation of reciprocal tariffs starting next month while addressing a joint session of the US Congress.

Sensex surges 800 points. Why is the stock market rising today?Today's rebound has brought much-needed relief to traders on Dalal Street, reviving hopes of a broader recovery in the days ahead. Here's what's driving the rally and whether the downturn has bottomed out.

Explained: Why Coforge shares jumped nearly 10% todayCoforge share price: The stock reached an intraday high of Rs 7,924.50 in early trade and was up 8.65% to Rs 7,827.25 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 10:20 am.

entertainment.headline: Actor Parambrata jokes about playing a cop ahead of Khakee: The Bengal ChapterActor Parambrata Chattopadhyay recently joked about playing a police officer ahead of his Netflix series, Khakee: The Bengal Chapter. The actor even shared reasons behind nodding to feature in the political drama.

Khakee The Bengal Chapter trailer: Neeraj Pandey show dives into politics, crimeThe trailer for Khakee The Bengal Chapter was unveiled on March 5. The show promises a riveting series filled with action, drama, and political intrigue.
K-pop group SEVENTEEN member Wonwoo to enlist in military in AprilSEVENTEEN's Wonwoo is set to begin his mandatory military service in April, as confirmed by Pledis Entertainment.

Lollapalooza 2025: Shawn Mendes, Louis Tomlinson to make India debutLollapalooza India is making a grand return in 2025 at Mumbai's Mahalaxmi Racecourse. With an eclectic lineup featuring Green Day, Shawn Mendes, and more, this festival promises an unforgettable musical experience.

Actor Sumbul Touqeer blasts trolls for body-shaming: Never been more madTelevision actor Sumbul Touqeer Khan has addressed the body-shaming and trolling she faced in a recent social media post. She clarified that her weight gain was due to medication and urged trolls to stop their unwarranted comments.

With Love, Meghan first reviews: Meghan Markle's show called queasy, unlovableIn 'With Love, Meghan', Meghan Markle arranges flowers, cooks delectable exquisite food with her celebrity friends, and gives stunning glimpses of her gorgeous Montecito house with a sprawling ocean view.

Black Doves: Keira Knightley show is essential viewing for thriller enthusiastsBritish stars Keira Knightley and Ben Whishaw's thriller series Black Doves is both relentless and rewarding. The underrated gem is currently streaming on Netflix.

Aashram 3 Part 2: Aaditi Pohankar's Pammi outshines Bobby Deol's Baba NiralaAaditi Pohankar's character as Pammi has garnered her immense love and appreciation from fans. Her fierce portrayal and her quest to take revenge against Bobby Deol's Baba Nirala truly makes her the hero of the series.

Bobby Deol had a vertigo attack while promoting Aashram: Was very nervousActor Bobby Deol recently revealed that he suffered from a vertigo attack while promoting his popular show Aashram. The actor is currently seen in the latest season of the show, which is streaming on MX Player.

Explained: The plagiarism controversy around BLACKPINK's Jennie's new song BLACKPINK member Jennie Kim released the teaser of her new single, 'Like Jennie', on social media, and several social media users, especially Indians, found it quite similar to Alia Bhatt's theme song from 'Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani'.

Kanye West's wife Bianca goes nude again after controversial Grammy outingKanye West's wife Bianca Censori went nude for a photoshoot. This comes a month after her controversial 'nude' outfit at the Grammys.

Actor Shoaib Ibrahim reacts to divorce rumours: Dipika ne diya mujhe dhokhaTelevision couple, Dipika Kakar and Shoaib Ibrahim have found themselves at the center of the separation rumours. The two addressed the same in their new vlog on YouTube.

Shonali Bose on DU, Miranda House's objection to Ziddi Girls: It was heartbreakingPrime Video's Ziddi Girls faced backlash from sections of Delhi University and Miranda House students over perceived negative portrayal, but director Shonali Bose clarifies the trailer was misunderstood and most students ultimately enjoyed the show.

Anora OTT release: When and where to watch the Oscar-winning Best FilmThe Oscar-winning film 'Anora' is set to stream on JioHotstar from March 17. Directed by Sean Baker and starring Mikey Madison, who won Best Actress, the movie offers a thought-provoking narrative.
Singer Dolly Parton's husband Carl Dean dies at 82Carl Dean, husband of Dolly Parton and inspiration for her hit song, Jolene, has died at the age of 82.

Blackpink's Lisa on her new album Alter Ego: Want people to feel empoweredLisa of Blackpink recently spoke about her new solo album, Alter Ego. In a virtual panel discussion, the singer shared her desire to make listeners feel empowered with her new album.

Maharani 4 teaser: Huma Qureshi returns as Rani Bharti to safeguard BiharActor Huma Qureshi is set to return as Rani Bharti in Maharani Season 4. The makers announced the news with the teaser of the upcoming gripping series.

TV show Tenali Rama set catches fire, shoot haltedA fire broke out on the set of TV show Tenali Rama due to a generator malfunction, halting production. There were no casualties, but the set suffered damage and repairs are underway.

Be Happy: Abhishek Bachchan reunites with Ludo co-actor Inayat in feel-good filmThe trailer of Abhishek Bachchan and Inayat Verma's upcoming dance-drama Be Happy was released today. Directed by Remo D'Souza, the heartfelt film will premiere on Prime Video on March 14.

BTS' J-hope's Seoul concert: New song, fan proposal and special appearance by JinBTS member and rapper J-hope recently held a concert in Seoul which was attended by his close friend and singer Kim Seokjin (Jin). The concert was one big event for the fans as it consisted of many other surprises besides the central performance by the artiste.

Khakee The Bengal Chapter: Jeet and Prosenjit announce release date with fun clipThe next installment of Netflix's critically acclaimed thriller series Khakee, Khakee: The Bengal Chapter will premiere on Netflix in March. The makers of the show announced its release date with a fun video.

Anupamaa actor Sudhanshu Pandey breaks silence on rumoured feud with Rupali GangulyActor Sudhanshu Pandey has addressed the ongoing rumours about a feud with his Anupamaa co-star Rupali Ganguly. In an interview, he clarified the situation and dismissed the speculations.

BRIT Awards 2025: Charli XCX wins album of the year, full winners list hereCharli XCX emerged as a major winner at the Brit Awards 2025, securing multiple accolades. Artists including Sabrina Carpenter and Billie Eilish also took home some of the biggest awards of the night.

Honey Singh's Millionaire Delhi concert: A night of nostalgia, iconic hitsHoney Singh's Delhi concert was packed with nostalgic hits, emotional tributes, surprise guests, and exclusive remixes. The rapper promised bigger things ahead as his Millionaire Tour continues.

Justin Bieber celebrates 31st birthday with family, shares rare pics of son JackPop sensation Justin Bieber marked his 31st birthday with a heartwarming family gathering. He shared rare photos with wife Hailey and their son Jack, capturing the joyous occasion.

Singer Billy Joel stumbles and falls mid-performance, fans say 'that's painful'During a recent performance, legendary musician Billy Joel stumbled and fell onstage, causing fans to worry about his health. The incident has sparked widespread concern and discussions about the artist's well-being.

At sold-out Delhi concert, Honey Singh vows to bring Grammys to India. WatchAt his Delhi concert, Honey Singh wowed fans with his hits and vowed to bring a Grammy to India, inspired by AR Rahman's Oscars win. He also expressed his deep love for Delhi and its people.

Honey Singh set to perform in Delhi, excited fans rush to the venueSinger and rapper Honey Singh is set to perform in Delhi today as part of his ongoing Millionaire India tour. Ahead of the concert, excited fans were seen rushing to the venue as soon as the gates opened.

Honey Singh on online negativity against him: I've been here before YouTube existedSinger and rapper Honey Singh took a dig at those spreading negativity about him through YouTube podcasts. During his Lucknow concert last night, he also spoke about his lifestyle changes.

Shreya Ghoshal's X account hacked: Tried every thing in my capacityRenowned singer Shreya Ghoshal has disclosed that her X account has been compromised since February 13. Despite efforts, she remains unable to access or delete the account.
Splitsvilla 15's Rushali Yadav-Harsh Arora engaged: Just perfectly usSplitsvilla 15 contestants Rushali Yadav and Harsh Arora are now engaged. The couple fell in love on the show.

Nadaaniyan trailer: Ibrahim, Khushi's romance comes with a priceIbrahim Ali Khan is all set to making his acting debut in Nadaaniyan, a love story with a secret deal. Also starring Khushi Kapoor, the film explores romance, ambition, and chaos. It will start streaming on Netflix from March 7.

Honey Singh returns to Delhi for sold-out Millionaire concert: What to expectYo Yo Honey Singh's Millionaire India Tour hits Delhi with a sold-out show, 20,000 fans, top celebs, and a surprise setlist. His parents will attend the concert, making this emotional homecoming extra special.

Honey Singh wishes to team up with Diljit Dosanjh, urges fans to make it happenSinger Honey Singh, currently touring India for his Millionaire India Tour, expressed his desire to collaborate with Diljit Dosanjh again during his recent concert in Lucknow. He urged fans to tag the Peaches singer, hoping to reunite for a new project.

Shabana Azmi reacts to comparisons between Dabba Cartel and Saas, Bahu Aur FlamingoShabana Azmi addressed concerns over comparisons between her Netflix show Dabba Cartel and Dimple Kapadia's Saas, Bahu Aur Flamingo, emphasising the unique elements of each series.

Singer Palash Sen on Diljit's concert culture remark, Euphoria 2.0 and remixesEuphoria's lead vocalist Palash Sen opened up about Diljit Dosanjh's controversial concert culture remark, the rebranding of the band and more in an exclusive interaction with India Today Digital. Sen recently collaborated with Bollywood star Akshay Kumar on the song, Mahakal Chalo.

general news.headline: Trump is transactional: Fareed Zakaria as US reshapes its foreign policiesGeopolitical expert Fareed Zakaria described US President Donald Trump's foreign policy as purely transactional, emphasising that he relentlessly shapes the agenda to his advantage and pressures opponents into win-lose situations.

Wasn't aware of any of it: Karnataka top cop on actor daughter's arrestKarnataka DGP Ramachandra Rao, the father of actor Ranya Rao, distanced himself from his daughter's gold smuggling case, saying he was unaware of it. The Kannada actor was caught with over 14 kg gold worth Rs 12 crore from Bengaluru airport.

India, New Zealand to battle in Champions Trophy final after 25 years Champions Trophy 2025: New Zealand produced an all-round effort to outclass South Africa in the second semi-final in Lahore. New Zealand and India will meet in the final of an ICC white-ball tournament for the first time since 2000.

US confirms holding talks with Hamas over hostages held in GazaThe US has confirmed holding direct talks with Palestinian terror group Hamas on the hostages held in Gaza. US envoy Steve Witkoff is set to return to the region to advance ceasefire negotiations.

Sleeping single, staying married: The rise of sleep divorce in IndiaOver 70% of Indian couples opt for sleep divorce to improve rest, citing snoring, stress, and mismatched schedules - highlighting a global sleep crisis impacting health and relationships, according to a study.

Tamil couples can't make babies fast enough to please Stalin or save Lok Sabha seatsSaying that Tamil Nadu might lose parliamentary seats as it successfully controlled population growth, Chief Minister MK Stalin has urged couples to have babies without delay. Statistically speaking, can Tamil couples actually add babies to the population at the rate and in the duration that Stalin seeks?

US exempts automakers from new Canada and Mexico tariffs for 1 monthThe White House said President Donald Trump exempted automakers from his new 25 per cent tariffs on Canada and Mexico for one month as long as they followed the existing free trade agreement.

BJP vs Congress over Mani Shankar Aiyar's 'Rajiv Gandhi failed twice' remarkCongress veteran Mani Shankar Aiyar's video, shared by BJP leaders, claims that Rajiv Gandhi failed at Cambridge University and Imperial College in London. The video drew a sharp reaction from Congress leaders.

Biju Babu's birthday takes battle turn, BJD and Congress pounce on BJPThe BJP government of Odisha's move to delink Biju Patnaik's birth anniversary from Panchayati Raj Day and cancel the state holiday has sparked a political firestorm in the coastal state. With protests on the streets and barbs from the BJD and the Congress, the battle around Biju Babu's legacy is only hotting up.

After pausing military aid, US cuts off intel sharing with Ukraine: ReportThe US has halted intelligence-sharing with Ukraine, impacting its military strategy, as Zelenskyy expresses willingness to negotiate peace and sign a mineral deal with Trump.

Send Abu Azmi to UP, we'll take care of rest: Yogi Aditayanath to Samajwadi PartyYogi Adityanath asked the Samajwadi Party to expel Abu Azmi and send him to Uttar Pradesh. "We know well how to deal with such people," he said after row over Azmi's Aurangzeb comment.

Rajasthan minister calls Akbar 'rapist', says Aurangzeb killed 'countless Hindus'Rajasthan Education Minister Madan Dilawar, speaking in the Rajasthan Assembly, said labelling Akbar as 'great' was an insult to the country as he was a rapist and a looter.

Ayesha Takia on case against husband Farhan Azmi: Goan goons bullied him, sonFormer actor Ayesha Takia shared a bunch of posts detailing her ordeal after a case was registered against her husband, Abu Farhan Azmi, by Goa police for a public altercation.

MacBook Air M4 launched in India and it is Rs 15,000 cheaper than Air M3 modelApple has announced its new 13-inch and 15-inch MacBook Air models in India, powered by the advanced M4 chip and featuring an all-new "Sky Blue" colour option.

Canada takes US to world trade body over Trump's 'unjustified tariffs'Donald Trump's 25 per cent tariff on goods imported from Canada, one of the US's biggest trading partners, came into effect on Tuesday.

New income tax bill proposes allowing officers access to your email, social mediaThe new bill gives tax officers the authority to access computers, emails, and social media accounts, raising privacy concerns.

Why ghosts of 2022 talks might return to haunt ZelenskyyJust weeks after Russia invaded Ukraine in February 2022, officials from both sides met in Belarus and Turkey for peace talks. The negotiations fell through. Three years later, after losing territory and thousands of people, Ukraine might find terms of peace much more difficult to settle. This comes as Russia digs in amid US President Donald Trump withdrawing war support for Kyiv.

Kannada actor Ranya Rao's gold smuggling MO: Same jacket and belt, cop as escortActor Ranya Rao, stepdaughter of Karnataka DGP Ramachandra Rao, returned with heavy gold ornaments every time she returned from Dubai but managed to avoid scrutiny.

29% of women appreciate the reduced pressure of 'happily ever after': SurveyMarriage, once seen as the grand finale of love stories, is now just one of many possible endings. Tinder's in-app survey reveals a growing preference for meaningful connections, safety, and authenticity over traditional dating norms.

SA vs NZ: Kane Williamson surpasses AB de Villiers after 15th ODI hundredNew Zealand batter Kane Williamson scored a magnificent century in the second semi-final of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 against South Africa. He played a brilliant knock of 102 (94) smashing ten fours and two sixes.

Rachin Ravindra emulates Sourav Ganguly with twin hundreds in Champions Tropy 2025Champions Trophy, SA vs NZ: Rachin Ravindra became the eighth batter and the first New Zealander to hit more than one hundred in an edition of the Champions Trophy. The 24-year-old hit his fifth hundred in ICC ODI tournaments.

How can Smriti Mandhana's RCB qualify for playoffs? WPL 2025: Smriti Mandhana's Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) need to win both their remaining matches to give themselves a decent chance of qualifying for the playoffs. They are currently on a four-match losing streak.

Virat Kohli climbs further in ODI rankings after Australia heroics Champions Trophy 2025: Virat Kohli has climbed to No.4 in the ICC rankings for ODI batters after he played a match-winning knock in the semi-final on Tuesday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

This is your team: When MS Dhoni handed CSK captaincy to Ruturaj GaikwadCSK captain Ruturaj Gaikwad recalled the moment when MS Dhoni handed over the reins of the team ahead of the IPL 2024 season. Ruturaj was given CSK captaincy just before the start of the season.

Semifinal Highlights: New Zealand beat South Africa by 50 runs to advance to finalChampions Trophy semifinal, South Africa (SA) vs New Zealand (NZ) Live Updates: New Zealand beat South Africa by 50 runs in the second semi-final of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. David Miller scored a sensational century in losing cause scoring an unbeaten 100* (67). For  New Zealand, Mitchell Santner starred with the ball registering figures of 3/43 in ten overs.

Indian team's brotherhood on the field is their biggest strength: S SreesanthFormer pacer S Sreesanth feels that the brotherhood within the Indian team is their biggest strength as they reached the final of the Champions Trophy 2025. Sreesanth also praised Gautam Gambhir, Rohit Sharma and the support staff for their handling of the squad.

BCCI extends Indian team SOPs to IPL franchises ahead of 2025 season: ReportThe BCCI has decided to partially implement its recently rolled out Indian team SOPs to the 10 IPL franchises ahead of the IPL 2025 season. The IPL 2025 season is set to start from March 22 in Kolkata.

Let Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma continue playing and win Olympic gold: S SreesanthFormer pacer S Sreesanth wants to see retirement questions for Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli coming to an end. Sreesanth wants the star duo to play for India and win the Olympics gold in 2028.

Grandmaster of chases: Virat Kohli cements GOAT status, one single at a timeVirat Kohli has stepped up with the bat in two of India's biggest games so far in the Champions Trophy. With one single at a time, the batting great is further cementing his reputation as one of the greatest chasters in one-day cricket.

Steve Smith retires from ODIs after Australia crash out in semisChampions Trophy: Steve Smith has retired from ODIs after Australia failed to go through to the final of the mega event following the four-wicket loss to India on Tuesday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

Watch: Inimitable Ravi Shastri lights up dressing room ceremony after India's semifinal winRavi Shastri lit up the Indian dressing room in typical fashion after their win against Australia in the semi-final of the Champions Trophy 2025. Shastri delivered a motivational message to the Indian team after the win.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.
